Class XStreamJSONSerialization

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.caelum.vraptor.serialization.xstream.XStreamJSONSerialization
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JSONSerialization, NoRootSerialization, Serialization, View
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RestfulSerializationJSON

    @Component
public class XStreamJSONSerialization
extends Object
implements JSONSerialization
    XStream implementation for JSONSerialization
